name: Backend
postCreateCommand:
sudo chown vscode -R /home/vscode/.zinit && sudo chown vscode -R /home/vscode/.zsh_history && sudo chown vscode -R /home/vscode/.ssh && go mod download && go install github.com/codegangsta/gin@latest && go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@v1.61.0 && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y neovim git && mkdir -p /workspace/backend/devcontainer-nvim && cp-r $HOME/.config/nvim /workspace/backend/.devcontainer/devcontainer-nvim/ && cp -r /workspace/backend/.devcontainer/devcontainer-nvim/* /workspace/backend/devcontainer-nvim && git clone https://github.com/folke/lazy.nvim /workspace/backend/devcontainer-nvim/lazy.nvim &&
XDG_CONFIG_HOME=/workspace/backend/devcontainer-nvim nvim --headless -c 'Lazy! sync' -c 'quitall'
